alert.note: Alert for Washington Palouse (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 11 at 4:06PM PDT until April 11 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...SPRING SNOW CONTINUES ACROSS PARTS OF THE INLAND NW... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow at times. Additional snow accumulations up to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Rosalia, Colfax, Tekoa, Dobson Pass, La Crosse, St. Maries, Uniontown, Fernwood, Lookout Pass, Pullman, Mullan, Oakesdale, and Pinehurst. * WHEN...Until 11 PM PDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
